participant_1.background:
I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs.
I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot.
I would not be able to weld if I was blind because I need to see the metal I am welding.
i eat junk food.
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.

participant_2.background:
I have been single for a while now and enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.
I like to play pretend with my daughter.
I enjoy working with my hands and making beautiful jewelry.
i own a ford truck.
i m very familiar with hospitals and doctors.

content.text: Doing well, how are you today?
I'm doing pretty good, thank you! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy fishing, relaxing, and spending time with my daughter.
That sounds nice! What do you like to make for fun?
I enjoy working with my hands and making beautiful jewelry.
That's really cool! I'm not much of a crafter, but I do enjoy playing music.
Oh that's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and sing. I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn to play an instrument.
It's really fun! I'd be happy to teach you sometime.
That would be great! I'd love to learn.
